ruleContent.content:
<js>
z = source.getVariable().split(",");
if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){
  src=eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>
$[*]

<js>
sort = [];
push = (title, url) => sort.push({ title, url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25 } });

[
  ["穿越小说", "xclass/chuanyue/{{page}}/"],
  ["言情小说", "xclass/yanqing/{{page}}/"],
  ["现代都市", "xclass/dushi/{{page}}/"],
  ["耽美百合", "xclass/baihe/{{page}}/"],

  ["武侠仙侠", "xclass/wuxia/{{page}}/"],

ruleContent.content:
<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

b = java.md5Encode(b);
var d = b.substring(0, 16);
var e = b.substring(16);
return java.aesBase64DecodeToString(a,e,"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",d)
}

result=eval(src.match(/(d\("[\s\S]+"\))\);/)[1])
} catch(err) {

result=result
}

a=escape(result).replace(/%u200[ABDCEF]/g,"")
unescape(a)

</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="{{source.getKey()}}/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
/*
	20230724 更新验证码获取逻辑，获取一次正确的验证码后，一段时间内无需再次获取-尐哖
  20230723 修改发现为动态获取-尐哖
	可以手动切换
	改变源URL地址(sourceURL)，网站就会切换
	下面套娃网站(m和www通用)
	希望中文：https://m.5xw.net
	123读书：https://m.123du.vip
	滨州书站：https://m.binzhousz.com
	偶然中文：https://m.or7.net
	趣七屋：https://m.qu7.net
	博趣中文：https://m.1bqg.net
	洪都中文：https://m.nchdzx.com
	我来读：https://m.wolaido.com
	益生原文学：https://m.cnyxfs.com
	齐齐读：https://m.qiqidu.net
  博看：https://m.bokank.com
  二品中文：https://m.2pzw.com
*/
try{
	c2=result.match(/c2="(.*?)"/)[1]
	u2=result.match(/src="(.*?)"/)[1]
	origin=baseUrl.match(/[^.]+[^/]+/)[0]
	str=java.ajax(origin+u2).match(/function.*\(\)\}/)[0]
	eval(str);temp=ajax(c2)
	java.ajax(origin+temp)
 if(baseUrl.match(/sscc/)){
 	u=java.get("url")}else{u=baseUrl}
 	//java.log(u)
	result=java.ajax(u)
}catch(err){result}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
try{
	actyzm=result.match(/actyzm" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];
	button=result.match(/button" value="([^"]+)"/)[1];	
	url=java.get("url");
	code=String(url).replace(/\/sscc.*/,'')+"/member/getcode.asp";
	yzco=source.getVariable();
	function getOption(str,co){
  	hed={"Referer":url,"Cookie":co}
  	return JSON.stringify({"method":"POST",
"charset":"gb2312","body":"actyzm="+actyzm+"&yzm="+str+"&button="+button,"headers":hed});
  }
  function succes(){
		yzm=java.getVerificationCode(code);
		url+=","+getOption(yzm,"");
		hm=java.ajax(url);
		co=java.getCookie(url,"g3jy9sqo0ws");
   source.setVariable(yzm+',g3jy9sqo0ws='+co)
   return hm;
  }
	if(yzco&&yzco!=''){
		v=String(yzco).split(',');
		u=url+","+getOption(v[0],v[1]);
		result=java.ajax(u);
		if(/请输入验证码/.test(result)){
			java.longToast("  ！验证码过期或有误，重新获取  ！")
			result=succes();
		}
	}else{result=succes("");}
result
}catch(err){java.log(err);result}
</js>
.B

loginUrl:
<js>
function browserLogin() {
  try {
    java.startBrowserAwait(
      "https://qidian.com", 
      "登录"
    )
  } catch (e) {}
  let ywkey = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywkey")
  let ywguid = cookie.getKey("qidian.com", "ywguid")
  putLoginHeader({
  	  guid: ywguid,
  	  key: ywkey
  })
  cookie.removeCookie("qidian.com")
  // java.toast("没做完:(")
}

function login() {}

function tokenLogin() {
  if (source.getLoginInfoMap() == null) {
    java.toast("未获取到LoginInfoMap，请尝试重新打开登录UI再按一遍")
  }
  putLoginHeader({
    guid: source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywguid"],
    key: source.getLoginInfoMap()["ywkey"]
  })
  java.toast("凭据保存成功")
}

function proxyExcWrapper(fun) {
  try {
    fun()
  } catch (e) {
    java.log(e.toString() + "\n" + e.stack)
  }
}

function empty() {
  java.toast("别点了，用来看的")
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var Regs = [/bookId=(\d+)/i, /\.com\D+?\/(\d+)/i, /(\d+)/i];
var bookId = "";
for (let Reg of Regs) {
    let mat = baseUrl.match(Reg);
    if (mat) {
        bookId = mat[1];
        break;
    }
}
java.ajax(QDSign("v2/bookdetail/get", [
    "bookId=" + bookId
]))
</js>

ruleContent.content: let info = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result)) let content = "" let header = getLoginHeader() switch (info.source) { case "qd": let bid = java.hexDecodeToString(java.ajax(book.tocUrl)) let cid = info.cid if (info.isVip) { let url = `https://ksapp.qidian.com/ajax/chapter/getInfo?debug=1&bookId=${bid}&chapterId=${cid}&_csrfToken,` + JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 8.1.0; MI PAD 4 Build/OPM1.171019.019; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/90.0.4430.226 KsWebView/1.8.90.612 (rel) Safari/537.36 NetType/wifi Language/zh miniProgram/1.60.0 KUAISHOU/11.5.30.31599 aegon/3.32.2', Connection: 'Keep-Alive', 'platformType': 'android', Referer: 'https://miniapi.ksapisrv.com/', 'content-type': 'application/json', Cookie: `ywguid=${header.guid}; ywkey=${header.key}` } }) let body = JSON.parse(java.log(java.ajax(url))).data let user = body.user body = body.chapterInfo content = body.content if (body.vipStatus && !body.limitFree && !body.isBuy) { content += ("\n=============\n试读结束，继续阅读请 [购买]\n本章价格: " + body.price + "点") } } else { let request = QDSign("v2/bookcontent/safegetcontent", [ "bookId=" + bid, "chapterId=" + cid ], "", true) let body = getBytes(request.url, request.headers) let decrypt = dContentQD(cid, body) let raw = JSON.parse(decrypt) let cArr = raw.Content.split("\r\n") let blocks = {} for (let i of raw.Blocks) { blocks[i.Sort] = i } for (let i = 0; i < cArr.length; i++) { content += cArr[i] + "\n" if (blocks[i + 1] && blocks[i + 1].Type == "image") content += `\n` } } } content

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#article form")
txt=java.getElement("#article [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#article form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		
		}
result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n换一章！！！\n或者\n换本书！！！\n或者\n换源！！！"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#content label")
txt=java.getElement("#content [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#content form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		
		}
result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n换一章！！！\n或者\n换本书！！！\n或者\n换源！！！"}
</js>

<js>
var cf=/_cf_/.test(src);
if(cf){
	cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
	var x=java.get("url");
	b=java.startBrowserAwait(x,
		"验证");
	//b=java.webView(null,x,null)
	//b=java.ajax(x)
	result=b;
	}
		result;

</js>

}

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(/netUrl/.test(baseUrl)){
  b = source.getKey();
  url1 = String(baseUrl).replace(/netUrl\//,'');
  page = String(java.ajax(url1)).match(/\(第1\/(\d+)页\)/)[1];
  url2 = String(url1).replace(/(\d+).html/,"$1_"+page+".html");
  url = b+java.ajax(url2).match(/<a href="([^"]+)">下一节<\/a>/)[1];
  java.put('url',url);
result=java.ajax(url);
}
result
</js>.RBGsectionThree-content p@textNodes

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
list=[];
base = source.getKey();
lis=java.getElements('section .BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a');
for(i in lis){
	url=lis[i].attr('href');
	/javascript/.test(url)?url='/netUrl'+lis[i-1].attr('href'):url;
	url=base+url;
	list.push({"text":lis[i].text(),"href":url})
}
list
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

<js>
var sk=java.get("sk");
var su=source.getKey();
var v=source.getVariable();
var so=/s.php/.test(baseUrl);
if(so){
	var bu=baseUrl.match(/^(.+)\/s.php/)[1];
if(bu!=su&&bu!=v){
	source.setVariable(bu);
	java.toast("地址变动，重新搜索加载！")
	result=java.ajax(baseUrl+`,{
		"body": "s=${String(sk)}",
		"method": "POST"}`);
		}
	}else{result=result}
	result;
</js>

	li;
</js>

url=l

	}
url1
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节|免费章节.|章节目录)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)\n🎯当前源：序号🔺'+x+'🔻【'+$[x].site_name+'】'+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻【'+$[i].site_name+'】 \n选用率：'+$[i].choose+' \n更新时间： '+$[i].updated_at+'\n最新章节： '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
result = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(result));
if(baseUrl.match(/\?keyword=/)){
if(result.book[0]==undefined){
sourl = source.getKey()+"/v1/lists.api?keyword="+java.get('key');
result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(sourl)).data;	
}
}	
result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js>
  u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
  cookie.removeCookie(u);
	hm=java.get(u,{});	cs=decodeURIComponent(String(hm.header("Set-Cookie")).replace(/[eE]xpires[^;]+;|[pP]ath=\/;|,|httponly|\s/g,'').replace(/^;|;$/g,''));	token=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(hm.body()).select('input[name="_token"]').attr('value');
s=page>1?'&page='+page:'';	body="_token="+token+"&kw="+key+s;
	head={"cookie":cs}
	post={
		"method": "POST",
		"body":body,
		"headers":head
	}
u+"/search/,"+JSON.stringify(post)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleContent.content: do{ t=Date();t1=Number(t.charAt(17));t2=Number(t.charAt(19));t3=Number(t.charAt(20));t4=Number(t.charAt(22));t5=Number(t.charAt(23)); //var t=new Date(); //year=t.getFullYear(); //java.log("🍊"+year); n=(t2+t4)%6*1000+t1*100+t3*10+t5; r=java.ajax("http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/"+n.toString()); java.setContent(r); } while(r.includes("404 Not Found")); //获取4个随机数其中第一个数小于6，大概大于5919无内容，并访问网址 chapter.title=java.getString('class.text-title@text'); chapter.url="http://m.wufazhuce.com/article/"+n.toString(); //传出标题 s=String(java.getString('class.text-content@html')); //获取正文内容 if(s.includes("]*src\=\"([^"]+?)(\?imageView[^"]+)?\"[^>]*>/g,'')} //判断正文是否有图片并处理 else if(s.includes("")){s=s.replace(//,"")} if(source.getVariable()<=0||source.getVariable()=="NaN"||book.variable==null){ book.variable=""; source.setVariable(39); } else{ source.setVariable(source.getVariable()-1); } book.variable+="\n★"+chapter.title+"\n"+s; book.variable;

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data)
//java.log(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data))
</js>result

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

bookSourceComment:
11/13更新：
1.发现更换域名为列表带图的m站；
2.部分长评需要进入详情页面获取，正文修复显示完整评论；
1.点击按时间排序或点赞排序可切换书评加载顺序，更换后请刷新目录和正文;
2.可对发现结果进行筛选，点击查看当前显示筛选状态;
3.发现列表提示TypeError:Cannot read property"1" from null就是该筛选状态下没有书籍。
by_tlyanyu

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>
$[*]

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说:|简介：)|各位书友.*/, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
